version_description:
* New Board & UI experience
(Tip: If like us, you aren't very good with Flags, just tap the player name above the board to know the country and full player name!)

- We made a mistake in our last release which stopped changing board position when a move in the Notation view is tapped. Thats fixed
- Fixed some crashes + stability improvements.

- Added option to Redeem a gift purchase. Please email us if you wish to redeem your Android purchase and use it on iOS too (Needs Google a/c).
- Added option to Redeem a gift purchase. Please email us if you wish to redeem your Android purchase and use it on iOS too (Needs Google a/c).

- Carlsen vs Karjakin world championship special : Now you can opt to receive per move notifications!
- Bug fixes

- Carlsen vs Karjakin world championship special : Now you can opt to receive per move notifications!
- Bug fixes

- Carlsen vs Karjakin world championship special : Now you can opt to receive per move notifications!
- Bug fixes

- Now you can share a game link with your friend. They can directly open the game in their Follow Chess app! (Thx Anish Giri).
Also supports opening a Follow Chess game link shared via the Android App or WhatsApp/Twitter/FB etc
- 3 to 4 times lesser data usage in Multi board screen
- Tapping WC move notification now opens the game (earlier bug did not open the game)

- Now you can share a game link with your friend. They can directly open the game in their Follow Chess app! (Thx Anish Giri).

- Tapping WC move notification now opens the game (earlier bug did not open the game)

- [FEATURE] Setting to Notify wins only (and ignore Draws)
- Other enhancements & bug fixes in Multi-board & All Games screen
- If you love the App, please help us Translate it in your language! (See Menu - Help us Translate)

- Move updates in Multi board & Analysis board screen are now faster than before!! (we have changed the underlying technology!)
- Added German language translations (Thanks Andreas)
- Gift a Friend! (You can gift 1 year / 1 month or lifetime PRO version of Follow Chess app to your friends/family!)
- Bug fixes & enhancements

- Now add game as favorites or quickly find the recent games that you have viewed
- Add a game to favorite from the Analysis board screen
- Easy access to WatchList | Recent Games & Favorites with the left slide out drawer
- Improved game caching
- Notification fixes for iOS 10
- German & Turkish translations (Thx Andreas & Nazmi)
